GV05garbhupu:1: oṃ pañcātmakaṃ pañcasu vartamānaṃ ṣaḍāśrayaṃ ṣaḍguṇayogayuktam / taṃ saptadhātuṃ trimalaṃ dviyoniṃ caturvidhāhāramayaṃ śarīram || GarUp_1
GV05garbhupu:2_0: pañcātmakam iti kasmāt pṛthivy āpas tejo vāyur ākāśam ity asmin pañcātmake śarīre
GV05garbhupu:2_1: kā pṛthivī kā āpaḥ kiṃ tejaḥ ko vāyuḥ kim ākāśam / tatra pañcātmake śarīre yat kaṭhinaṃ
GV05garbhupu:2_2: sā pṛthivī yad dravaṃ tā āpaḥ yad uṣṇaṃ tat tejaḥ yat saṃcarati sa vāyuḥ yac chuṣiraṃ
GV05garbhupu:2_3: tad ākāśam / tatra pṛthivī dhāraṇe āpaḥ piṇḍīkaraṇe tejaḥ prakāśane vāyur vyūhane
GV05garbhupu:2_4: ākāśam avakāśapradāne / pṛthak śrotre śabdopalabdhau tvak sparśe cakṣuṣī rūpe jihvā
GV05garbhupu:2_5: rasane nāsikā ghrāṇe upastha ānandane apānam utsarge buddhyā budhyati manasā saṃkalpayati
GV05garbhupu:2_6: vācā vadati / ṣaḍāśrayam iti kasmāt madhurāmlalavaṇatiktakaṭukaṣāyarasān vindatīti
GV05garbhupu:3_0: saptadhātukam iti kasmāt śuklo raktaḥ kṛṣṇo dhūmraḥ pītaḥ kapilaḥ pāṇḍura iti / yathā
GV05garbhupu:3_1: devadattasya dravyādiviṣayā jāyante / parasparaṃ saumyaguṇatvāt ṣaḍvidho rasaḥ rasāc
GV05garbhupu:3_2: choṇitaṃ śoṇitān māṃsaṃ māṃsān medo medasaḥ snāyavaḥ snāyubhyo 'sthīni asthibhyo
GV05garbhupu:3_3: majjā majjātaḥ śukraṃ śukraśoṇitasaṃyogād āvartate garbho hṛdi vyavasthāṃ nayati
GV05garbhupu:3_4: hṛdaye 'ntar āgniḥ agnisthāne pittaṃ pittasthāne vāyuḥ vāyuto hṛdayaṃ prājāpatyāt kramāt || GarUp_3
GV05garbhupu:4_0: ṛtukāle samprayogād ekarātroṣitaṃ kalalaṃ bhavati saptarātroṣitaṃ budbudam ardhamāsābhyantare
GV05garbhupu:4_1: piṇḍaṃ māsābhyantare kaṭhinaṃ māsadvayena śiraḥ māsatrayeṇa pādapradeśaḥ caturthe
GV05garbhupu:4_2: gulphajaṭharakaṭipradeśāḥ pañcame pṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ ṣaṣṭhe mukhanāsikākṣiśrotrāṇi saptame
GV05garbhupu:4_3: jīvena saṃyuktaḥ aṣṭame sarvalakṣaṇasampūrṇaḥ / pitū reto'tirekāt puruṣaḥ mātū reto'tirekāt
GV05garbhupu:4_4: strī ubhayor vojatulyatvān napaṃusakaṃ vyākulitamanaso 'ndhāḥ khañcāḥ kubjā vāmanā
GV05garbhupu:4_5: bhavanti / anyo 'nyavāyuparipīḍitaśukradvaidhyād dvidhā tanū syād yugmāḥ prajāyante /
GV05garbhupu:4_6: pañcātmakaḥ samarthaḥ pañcātmikā cetasā buddhir gandharasādijñānākṣarākṣaram oṃkāraṃ
GV05garbhupu:4_7: cintayatīti tad ekākṣaraṃ jñātvāṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ ṣoḍaśa vikārāḥ śarīre tasyaiva dehinaḥ /
GV05garbhupu:4_8: atha mātrāśitapītanāḍīsūtragatena prāṇa āpyāyate / atha navame māsi sarvalakṣaṇajñānasampūrṇo
GV05garbhupu:4_9: bhavati pūrvajātiṃ smarati śubhāśubhaṃ ca karma vindati || GarUp_4
GV05garbhupu:6: āhārā vividhā bhuktāḥ pītā nānāvidhāḥ stanāḥ /
GV05garbhupu:7: jātaś caiva mṛtaś caiva janma caiva punaḥ punaḥ || GarUp_5
GV05garbhupu:8: yan mayā parijanasyārthe kṛtaṃ karma śubhāśubham /
GV05garbhupu:9: ekākī tena dahye 'haṃ gatās te phalabhoginaḥ || GarUp_6
GV05garbhupu:10: aho duḥkhodadhau magno na paśyāmi pratikriyām /
GV05garbhupu:11: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat prapadye maheśvaram || GarUp_7
GV05garbhupu:13: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat prapadye nārāyaṇam || GarUp_8
GV05garbhupu:15: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat sāṃkhyaṃ yogam abhyase || GarUp_9
GV05garbhupu:17: yadi yonyāḥ pramuñcāmi dhyāye brahma sanātanam || GarUp_10
GV05garbhupu:18: atha yonidvāraṃ samprāpto yantreṇāpīḍyamāno mahatā duḥkhena jātamātras tu vaiṣṇavena vāyunā saṃspṛṣṭas tadā na smarati janma maraṇāni na ca karma śubhāśubhaṃ vindati || GarUp_11
GV05garbhupu:19_0: śarīram iti kasmāt agnayo hy atra śriyante jñānāgnir darśanāgniḥ koṣṭhāgnir iti tatra
GV05garbhupu:19_1: koṣṭhāgnir nāmāśitapītalehyacoṣyaṃ pacati / darśanāgnī rūpāṇāṃ darśanaṃ karoti /
GV05garbhupu:19_2: jñānāgniḥ śubhāśubhaṃ ca karma vindati / trīṇi sthānāni bhavanti mukhe āhavanīya
GV05garbhupu:19_3: udare gārhapatyo hṛdi dakṣiṇāgniḥ ātmā yajamāno mano brahmā lobhādayaḥ paśavo dhṛtir
GV05garbhupu:19_4: dīkṣā saṃtoṣaś ca buddhīndriyāṇi yajñapātrāṇi karmendriyāṇi havīṃṣi śiraḥ kapālaṃ
GV05garbhupu:19_5: keśā darbhāḥ mukham antarvediḥ catuṣkapālaṃ śiraḥ ṣoḍaśa pārśvadantapaṭalāni saptottaraṃ
GV05garbhupu:19_6: marmaśataṃ sāśītikaṃ saṃdhiśataṃ sanavakaṃ snāyuśataṃ sapta sirāśatāni pañca majjāśatāni
GV05garbhupu:19_7: asthīni ca ha vai trīṇi śatāni ṣaṣṭiḥ sārdhacatasro romāṇi koṭyo hṛdayaṃ palāny aṣṭau
GV05garbhupu:19_8: dvādaśa palā jihvā pittaprasthaṃ kaphasyāḍhakaṃ śukrakuḍavaṃ medaḥ prasthau dvāv
GV05garbhupu:19_9: aniyataṃ mūtrapurīṣam āhāraparimāṇāt / paippalādaṃ mokṣaśāstraṃ paippalādaṃ mokṣaśāstram iti || GarUp_12
